content.body: I see freenode has klined _all of IRCcloud_
content.formatted_body: I see freenode has klined all of IRCcloud

content.body: sure am glad we moved off freenode
yup. they even banned their own web client.
welp, seeing as how `irc.w3.org/#webassembly` is a ghost town these days anyway, i wonder if it makes sense renewing my IRCcloud membership anymore...
content.formatted_body: welp, seeing as how irc.w3.org/#webassembly is a ghost town these days anyway, i wonder if it makes sense renewing my IRCcloud membership anymore...

content.body: I’m still using it for libera. basically every freenode channel lives there
oh, true, i had completely forgotten about that
although i did hear about there already being some sort of scandal w/ that lol
read it in the comments of joepie91's freenode faq: https://gist.github.com/joepie91/df80d8d36cd9d1bde46ba018af497409#gistcomment-3769255
* read it in the comments of joepie91's freenode faq: https://gist.github.com/joepie91/df80d8d36cd9d1bde46ba018af497409#gistcomment-3769255

m.new_content.body: read it in the comments of joepie91's freenode faq: https://gist.github.com/joepie91/df80d8d36cd9d1bde46ba018af497409#gistcomment-3769255

content.body: I am missing what part of this is a scandal?
"some random posted spam in IRC" is tuesday, not a scandal
yeah it’s also clearly freenode trolls. one of those i banned from #node.js in freenode for libera spam last week is now freenode staff.
wow, i thought it was just one dude power tripping
nah it's the whole staff at this point
ok, that's not fair, I don't want to impugn all of them. but certainly several people.

> <@bakkot:matrix.org> ok, that's not fair, I don't want to impugn all of them. but certainly several people.

well, I do think that all nice people have left at this point so it's not really wrong...
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @bakkot:matrix.org
ok, that's not fair, I don't want to impugn all of them. but certainly several people.
well, I do think that all nice people have left at this point so it's not really wrong...
